en.title: **Software Engineer**
en.info: Sultan Moulay Slimane University, Beni Mellal
en.text: Pursued a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science with a focus on core fundamentals including compilers, networking, operating systems, mathematics, and physics. Developed strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

es.title: **Ingeniero de Software**
es.info: Universidad Sultán Moulay Slimane, Beni Mellal
es.text: Estudié una licenciatura en Ciencias de la Computación, enfocándome en compiladores, redes, sistemas operativos, matemáticas y física. Desarrollé habilidades sólidas de análisis y resolución de problemas.

fr.title: **Ingénieur Logiciel**
fr.info: Université Sultan Moulay Slimane, Beni Mellal
fr.text: Licence en informatique avec un accent sur les compilateurs, les réseaux, les systèmes d'exploitation, les mathématiques et la physique. Acquisition de solides compétences en résolution de problèmes.

ko.title: **소프트웨어 엔지니어**
ko.info: 술탄 물라이 슬리만 대학교, 베니 멜랄
ko.text: 컴퓨터 과학 학사 과정을 통해 컴파일러, 네트워킹, 운영 체제, 수학, 물리학 등의 핵심 기초를 학습하며 문제 해결 능력을 강화함.

en.title: **Full Stack MERN Developer**
en.text: Hands-on training in full stack web development using MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js. Gained practical experience through real-world projects and in-depth studies in cybersecurity, compilers, data structures, and operating systems.

es.title: **Desarrollador Full Stack MERN**
es.text: Formación práctica en desarrollo full stack con MongoDB, Express, React y Node.js. Experiencia en proyectos reales y estudio de ciberseguridad, compiladores, estructuras de datos y sistemas operativos.

fr.title: **Développeur Full Stack MERN**
fr.text: Formation pratique en développement full stack avec MongoDB, Express, React et Node.js. Projets réels et apprentissage approfondi en cybersécurité, compilateurs, structures de données et systèmes d’exploitation.

ko.title: **풀스택 MERN 개발자**
ko.text: MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js를 활용한 실무 중심의 풀스택 웹 개발 교육. 실제 프로젝트 경험과 함께 보안, 컴파일러, 자료구조, 운영체제 등 심화 학습 진행.
